# MISC::REGISTER_BOOL_TO_SAVE

## Summary
Registers a bool variable for saving in the currently-open block

## Parameters
* **BOOL\*** boolToSave
* **STRING** label:
Can be up to 63 characters.
It can't be the same as a Label used by any other REGISTER_...
command
